Name: Arcane Convergence
Story Background: As the ley lines align and converge, a surge of arcane energy envelops the battlefield, unifying the magical forces and amplifying their potency to great effect.
Ability: Arcane Convergence allows you to untap all lands you control and add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool, where X is the number of sorcery cards in your graveyard.
Appearance Description: The card features a network of glowing ley lines converging at a central point, casting a brilliant aura over the surrounding landscape and imbuing the land with a vibrant, otherworldly energy.
